initiatives.title: Anti-CAA Resolution
initiatives.description: First state in India to pass a resolution demanding the repeal of the Citizenship Amendment Act (CAA) and filed a suit in the Supreme Court.

initiatives.title: Resolution Against Farm Laws
initiatives.description: Legislative resolution rejecting the three central farm laws and expressing solidarity with protesting farmers.

initiatives.title: Resolution Against Uniform Civil Code (UCC)
initiatives.description: First state assembly to pass a resolution urging the Central Government not to implement the UCC, citing threats to pluralism.

initiatives.title: Recall of Lakshadweep Administrator
initiatives.description: Resolution demanding the recall of the Lakshadweep administrator due to controversial reforms affecting the islanders' culture and livelihood.

initiatives.title: Renaming 'Colonies' to 'Unnathi'
initiatives.description: Official order to abolish the colonial term 'Colony' for SC/ST settlements, replacing it with dignified terms like 'Unnathi', 'Nagar', or 'Prakrithi'.

initiatives.title: Gender-Neutrality in Education
initiatives.description: Comprehensive reforms to introduce gender-neutral uniforms, textbooks breaking stereotypes, and gender-neutral forms of address for teachers.

initiatives.title: Transgender Policy Implementation
initiatives.description: Operationalization of Transgender Policy including housing schemes, ID cards, and reservation in education.

initiatives.title: K-FON (Kerala Fibre Optic Network)
initiatives.description: State-wide fiber optic network providing free internet to BPL families and affordable access to others, declaring internet a basic right.
keyPoints: Internet as a Basic Human Right

initiatives.title: LIFE Mission
initiatives.description: Comprehensive housing mission to provide safe housing for all landless and homeless families in the state.

initiatives.title: Aardram Mission
initiatives.description: Transformation of Primary Health Centers into Family Health Centers (FHCs) with better facilities to strengthen public healthcare.

initiatives.title: Abolition of Nokkukooli
initiatives.description: Official ban on 'gawking wages' (Nokkukooli), declaring the practice unlawful to improve the investment climate.

initiatives.title: Welfare Board for MNREGS Workers
initiatives.description: First of its kind welfare fund board for MNREGS workers providing pension and medical assistance.

initiatives.title: Gig Workers Welfare Bill
initiatives.description: Proposed legislation to provide social security, registration, and welfare benefits to gig and platform workers.

initiatives.title: Extreme Poverty Eradication Project
initiatives.description: Micro-level intervention to identify and uplift the 'poorest of the poor' families with a target to eradicate extreme poverty by 2025.

initiatives.title: Student Police Cadets (SPC) Reforms
initiatives.description: Government decision to uphold secular uniformity in SPC by not allowing religious dress codes like hijabs within the cadet uniform.

initiatives.title: Kerala Infrastructure Investment Fund Board (KIIFB)
initiatives.description: Established to fund large-scale infrastructure projects, sanctioning funds for roads, power, and urban facilities.

initiatives.title: Base Price Fixing for Vegetables
initiatives.description: Programs to fix base prices for vegetables and provide financial security through the Farmers’ Welfare Fund Board.
keyPoints: Government procurement if market rates fall

initiatives.title: K-Smart App
initiatives.description: Digital platform for local body services, part of making Kerala the first fully e-governed state.

initiatives.title: Year of Enterprises
initiatives.description: Initiative to incubate MSMEs and scale them, including Mission 1000 for turnover growth.

initiatives.title: Social Security Pension Hikes
initiatives.description: Doubled social security pensions and introduced new schemes like Sthree Suraksha Pension.

initiatives.title: Karunya Arogya Suraksha Padhathi (KASP)
initiatives.description: Merged health schemes for free treatment to the poor, including care for rare diseases.

initiatives.title: Vizhinjam International Seaport
initiatives.description: Commissioned international seaport to enhance maritime trade and job creation.

initiatives.title: Kochi Water Metro
initiatives.description: India's first electric boat-based metro system for eco-friendly urban mobility.

initiatives.title: Kannur International Airport
initiatives.description: Completion of international airport to address connectivity gaps.

initiatives.title: Haritha Kerala Mission
initiatives.description: Mission for waste management, organic farming, and water body rejuvenation.

initiatives.title: Apna Ghar Housing for Migrants
initiatives.description: Quality housing scheme for migrant workers, integrated with insurance.

initiatives.title: Sthree Suraksha Pension
initiatives.description: Monthly pension for women aged 35-60 not covered by other schemes.

initiatives.title: Kerala Bank Merger
initiatives.description: Merger of co-operative banks for efficiency and profitability.

initiatives.title: Pink Protection Initiative
initiatives.description: Safeguards women in public, private, and digital spaces.

initiatives.title: Ayyankali Urban Employment Guarantee Scheme
initiatives.description: Provides 90 days of work at ₹291 daily wages, linked to housing and dairy.

initiatives.title: Subhiksha Keralam
initiatives.description: Cultivated fallow land, creating new units and employment.

initiatives.title: Institute of Advanced Virology
initiatives.description: Advances research on infectious diseases, linked to Global Virus Network.

initiatives.title: Antibiotic Sakshara Kerala
initiatives.description: Guidelines to combat antibiotic resistance in hospitals and communities.

initiatives.title: Hi-Tech Classrooms in Public Schools
initiatives.description: Infused funds to set up hi-tech classrooms in 45,000 public schools.

initiatives.title: Kerala Administrative Service (KAS)
initiatives.description: Created managerial cadre for efficient administration.

initiatives.title: Urja Kerala Mission
initiatives.description: Includes rooftop solar, LED projects, and carbon neutral initiatives.

initiatives.title: Rebuild Kerala Initiative
initiatives.description: Post-flood reconstruction with public engagement.

initiatives.title: Right to Sit Act
initiatives.description: Mandates seats for workers to promote dignity.

initiatives.title: Barrier-Free Tourism Policy
initiatives.description: Made 120 centers accessible for differently-abled.

initiatives.title: Nava Kerala Sadas
initiatives.description: Statewide tour for public feedback on governance.

initiatives.title: Youth Connect Scheme
initiatives.description: Aims to provide financial assistance to youth for education, skill development, and entrepreneurship.

initiatives.title: Increased Social Security Pension
initiatives.description: Increased The Social Security Pension to ₹2000 per month For All Pensioners.

initiatives.title: Kerala Public Health Act, 2023
initiatives.description: Consolidates and unifies the state's public health laws, replacing colonial-era acts to address modern epidemiological challenges with a 'One Health' approach.
keyPoints: Empowers local authorities for disease control
Focus on 'One Health' and lifestyle diseases

initiatives.title: Kerala State Private Universities (Establishment and Regulation) Bill, 2025
initiatives.description: Allows the establishment of private universities in the state to stem the flow of students migrating outside Kerala, marking a significant policy shift.
keyPoints: Reverses long-standing opposition to private varsities

initiatives.title: Kerala State Elderly Commission Act, 2025
initiatives.description: Establishes a statutory commission with quasi-judicial powers to protect the rights and welfare of the state's growing elderly population.

initiatives.title: Hospital Protection Act Amendment (2023)
initiatives.description: Introduced stringent non-bailable provisions and heavy penalties for violence against healthcare workers following the murder of Dr. Vandana Das.
keyPoints: Imprisonment up to 7 years for grievous hurt

initiatives.title: Hridyam
initiatives.description: A unique web-based initiative to support children with Congenital Heart Disease (CHD), providing free surgeries in government and empanelled private hospitals.

initiatives.title: Kerala Knowledge Economy Mission (KKEM)
initiatives.description: Strategic mission to transform Kerala into a knowledge economy, targeting the creation of 20 lakh jobs by 2026, with a focus on 'Work Near Home'.

initiatives.title: Malinya Muktham Nava Keralam
initiatives.description: A massive public campaign and policy drive to make Kerala completely garbage-free, supported by strict enforcement and fines for littering.

initiatives.title: Punargeham Project
initiatives.description: Rehabilitation project for families living within 50 meters of the coastline, moving them to safer locations to protect against coastal erosion.
keyPoints: Financial aid of ₹10 lakh per family

initiatives.title: Justice Hema Committee Report
initiatives.description: Release of the landmark report studying issues faced by women in the Malayalam film industry, leading to calls for a tribunal and new legislation.

initiatives.title: Heli-Tourism Policy 2024
initiatives.description: Policy framework to connect luxury destinations via helicopter services to attract high net-worth tourists.

initiatives.title: Kerala Panchayat Raj (Amendment) Bill, 2024
initiatives.description: Legislation introducing steep fines for dumping waste in public places and enforcing user fees for waste collection.
keyPoints: Fines up to ₹50,000 for dumping waste
Empowers local secretaries to levy fines

initiatives.title: Mittayi Scheme
initiatives.description: Comprehensive care scheme providing free insulin, insulin pens, and continuous glucose monitoring for children with Type-1 Diabetes.

initiatives.title: Operation Aag
initiatives.description: State-wide police operation to track and arrest fugitive anti-social elements and those listed under KAAPA.

initiatives.title: Graphene Aurora Project
initiatives.description: Establishment of India Innovation Centre for Graphene to foster R&D and commercialization of graphene technology.

initiatives.title: Kerala Lok Ayukta (Amendment) Bill
initiatives.description: Controversial amendment making the Lok Ayukta's verdict recommendatory rather than binding on the competent authority.
keyPoints: Removes binding nature of Lok Ayukta verdict

initiatives.title: Kerala Paper Products Limited (KPPL) Takeover
initiatives.description: State government takeover and revival of the central PSU Hindustan Newsprint Limited (HNL), renaming it KPPL.

initiatives.title: Loka Kerala Sabha
initiatives.description: A platform for Non-Resident Keralites to interact with the state government and contribute to policy formulation and development.

initiatives.title: Sabari K-Rice
initiatives.description: Launch of subsidized rice brand by Supplyco to counter market price inflation and compete with central 'Bharat Rice'.

initiatives.title: Keraleeyam
initiatives.description: Annual week-long cultural festival in Thiruvananthapuram showcasing Kerala's achievements, culture, and cuisine to the world.

initiatives.title: Safe Kerala Project (AI Cameras)
initiatives.description: Installation of AI-enabled cameras across the state to automatically detect traffic violations and reduce road accidents.

initiatives.title: Kerala Export Promotion Policy 2024
initiatives.description: Policy aiming to boost state exports to $20 billion by 2027-28 through logistics support and infrastructure subsidies.

initiatives.title: University Laws (Amendment) Bills
initiatives.description: Legislative attempt to remove the Governor as the Chancellor of state universities and replace them with eminent academicians.

initiatives.title: Operation P-Hunt
initiatives.description: Recurring cyber-operation to hunt down individuals involved in downloading, sharing, and viewing child sexual abuse material (CSAM).
keyPoints: Crackdown on Child Sexual Abuse Material
